work.description: The Site Reliability Engineering Program is an opportunity to learn how to be a great Site Reliability Engineer by completing an interactive curriculum getting you hands on experience with the tools used by thousands of companies around the world.

The McGill Robotics Team's software division is a large team responsible for programming the teams various robots. I worked on the Mars rover project, specifically on the arm subteam. I was responsible for developing inverse kinematics and path planning algorithms for use in a national competition.
